titulo: Customer Service Representative - Work From Home
descripcion:
• Do you have strong command of the English language? Are you looking for a promising career in customer service with a rapidly growing, global organization? We are hiring Customer Service Professions located in Santo Domingo to support inbound calls to US based customers in a remote/home office environment. You will need stable, high speed internet (at least 10MPBS) and an inverter/UPS for electricity backup and you must live in Santo Domingo, so we can provide, deliver, and setup your equipment. Interested? Apply Now to Speak with a Recruiter!

    RESPONSIBILITIES:

    **Responds to telephone inquiries from customers using standard scripts and procedures

    **Gathers information, researches concerns, and provides resolution

    **Informs customers about available services and assesses customer needs

    **Prepares standard reports to track workload, response time and quality of input

    PERKS & BENEFITS:

    **Stable Full-Time Employment & Overtime

    **Paid, Virtual Training

    **Insurance & Other Company Benefits

    **Flexible, Remote Work Environment

    REQUIREMENTS:

    **Customer Service Experience (Preferred)

    **Advanced English Speaking Skills

    **Broadband Internet Access (at least 10 MBps)

    **18+ Years Old & High School Graduate

    **Dominican ID (Cedula)

    **Basic Computer Skills
